feed.title: JayLex Adventures!
feed.subtitle: Justin and Alexis Adventures: Photography and memories. Est. 2015

entry.title: San Clemente State Beach Adventure!
entry.content:
Camped at San Clemente State Beach for the first time yesterday and it was great! Bobo says she can’t wait to go again. I’ll update the page with more photos from yesterday’s adventure soon.

For now enjoy this picture of the Bobo butt butt…

hehehe Photo Credit: Justin - San Clemente State Beach 2017
entry.summary: Camped at San Clemente State Beach for the first time yesterday and it was great! Bobo says she can’t wait to go again. I’ll update the page with more photos from yesterday’s adventure soon.

entry.title: Revisiting our past.
entry.content:
A long time ago, on a page not that far away. We have an old webpage that held some photos from old adventures here. The webpage still works for the most part and looks great, but takes way too long to maintain and update. So instead you’ll be able to view all of our new adventures here in blog style. If you don’t like it sorry, not sorry.

Take some time to check the old page out! It has some amazing pictures, mostly taken by Alexis that I might upload here given the time.

Later,

Justin

Photo Credit: Alexis - Aquarium of the Pacific Adventure 2016
entry.summary: A long time ago, on a page not that far away. We have an old webpage that held some photos from old adventures here. entry.title: The Adventure Commences… online.
entry.content:
Finally, a smoothly operating website for all our adventures! “Everybody’s been talking about it” (D. Trump).

Welcome to our website, stay tuned for photos of our adventures as a family. If you would like to donate to us for our adventuring please feel free to send us an email at ouradventuresphotography@gmail.com for further information.

’Til next time,

Justin

Photo Credit: Alexis - Zoo Adventure 2017
entry.summary: Finally, a smoothly operating website for all our adventures! “Everybody’s been talking about it” (D. Trump).
